title: The AIDS movie
brief_description: This film speaks simply and forcefully to students, It features Paul, Sunnye and Susan, three people with the AIDS disease, who share what it’s like to live with it and how to protect yourself against it. AIDS educator, David Brumbach, speaks on the importance of awareness and prevention.
